entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
